thread.section_title: Hotel Baldi - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good location but not in the most crowded part of the city
thread.title_full: Good location but not in the most crowded part of the city - Review of Hotel Baldi, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: ECPONTAZA
title: Good location but not in the most crowded part of the city
text: Spent 4 days in paris and this hotel was perfect for us. Since it was our first time in paris we spent most of the time outside. The hotel is good for resting and its location is perfect. Two blocks from Cambronne station and 15 minutes walking from Torre Eiffel. It is not fancy but it is clean and if I go back to Paris, I would stay again. Contrary to most hotels, the bathroom was big, very big.
